text: Quazi Tarikul Islam is a Bangladeshi physician and academic. As of 2017, he is a councillor and controller of examination in the Bangladesh College of Physicians and Surgeons. He has served as a member of the Regional Technical Advisor Group for Dengue, SEARO, WHO. He has over 97 publications in national and international journals. ==Early life and education== Islam was born in Rajshahi. He completed MBBS from Rajshahi Medical College. He completed FCPS (Medicine) from Bangladesh College of Physicians and Surgeons. ==Career== Islam was the Professor of Medicine both in Rajshahi Medical College and Dhaka Medical College. ==References== ==Further reading== * Category:Bangladeshi academics Category:Bangladeshi physicians Category:People from Rajshahi District Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Dhaka Medical College faculty
title: Quazi Tarikul Islam
